name: VitalSigns (Houdou)
description:
A mini multi-tasking game made during Ludum Dare 46.

It's my first LD, it's so fun making games again.

The main objective is to survive. Game will over if either:

- Body temperature is too high / too low.

- Too many uncollected Broken Heart

- Too many uncollected O2 or CO2

Try as hard as you can to keep it alive longer!

I'm sorry but I didn't add a happy ending in the game as it's kind of endless challenge game. In such a special pandemic time, everybody, please take care~
